articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Statement Distributed as Official Document of UNSC
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Statement Distributed as Official Document of UNSC
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry dated April 17 was distributed as the UN Security Council's official document S/2012/239 on April 19. It was issued in protest against the UNSC presidential statement adopted in violation of the right of the DPRK to launch satellites for peaceful purposes under the pressure of the U.S. and its followers.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from DRC President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from DRC President
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from Joseph Kabila Kabange, president of Democratic Republic of Congo, on April 23.
					The message said:
					
					I deem it an honor to send warm congratulations to you upon your election to the top posts of the party and state of the DPRK on behalf of the people of Democratic Congo and myself.
					
					Availing myself of this happy opportunity, I would like to reiterate to you my intention to boost the relations of friendship and cooperation between our two countries and peoples and sincerely wish you well-being and great success in your work to build a thriving nation.
					
					Please accept, Your Excellency First Chairman, my high regard.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Benin
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Benin
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Thomas Boni Yayi, president of Benin, on April 12.
					 The message said he was very pleased to extend warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un on behalf of the people and government of Benin on the occasion of April 15, 2012, the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the Korean people.
					
					 Availing himself of the special opportunity of celebrating the anniversary together with the Korean people, the president affirmed his strong intention to work together with Kim Jong Un to boost and vitalize the relations of friendship and cooperation that link the two peoples and the two states.
					
					 Hoping for the successful celebrations, the message wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the great and friendly Korean people peace and prosperity.
					
					 It expressed the highest consideration to Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Equatorial Guinea
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, president of Equatorial Guinea, on April 12. 
					 The message said April 15, 2012, centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung, is an auspicious day the Equatorial Guinean people should celebrate as an important and significant holiday together with the fraternal people of the DPRK. 
					
					 The deepest reverence of the Equatorial Guinean people for President Kim Il Sung always serves as the basic cornerstone promoting the cooperation between the two countries as it reflects the common idea for peace and progress, the message said. 
					
					 This significant day will once again ensure and guarantee the rosy prospect for friendship and cooperation between the two countries, it added, expressing the assurances of the highest consideration.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Bangladeshi President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Bangladeshi President
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Bangladeshi President Zillur Rahman on April 24. 
					 He said in his message that he was greatly pleased to send sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un on behalf of himself and government and people of Bangladesh on his election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK. 
					
					 He expressed the firm belief that the favorably developing bilateral relations will be activated in the future. 
					
					 He sincerely wished Kim Jong Un happiness in good health and comfort and the people of the DPRK sustained peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Tochigi Prefectural Citizens Council for Japan-Korea Friendship headed by Secretary General Koichi Hashimoto visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Saturday to express reverence for them.
					 The guests laid bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The delegation of Tochigi Prefectural Citizens Council for Japan-DPRK Friendship led by its secretary general visited Mangyongdae.
					 The guests looked round the historic relics there, being briefed on the glorious revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung and his patriotic and revolutionary family members of Mangyongdae. 
					
					 They had a photo taken in front of the President's old home.
					
					 At the end of the visit the head of the delegation said:
					
					 It is an honor for us to visit Mangyongdae in this significant period. The visit to Mangyongdae offered us an opportunity to know better about the great revolutionary career of the President.
					
					 The delegation also visited the E-library and Indoor Swimming Pool of Kim Il Sung University, the International Friendship Exhibition House, the Hana Music Information Center, the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace and other places.

articles.title: Delegation of Korean Medical Workers in U.S. Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of Korean Medical Workers in U.S. Arrives
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Korean medical workers in the U.S. led by Pak Mun Jae, vice-chairman of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S., arrived here by air Saturday. It is to take part in the 14th Pyongyang symposium on medical science of Koreans at home and abroad.

articles.title: Grand Banquet Given in Celebration of KPA Anniversary
articles.content:
Grand Banquet Given in Celebration of KPA Anniversary
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A banquet was given at the Mokran House Friday evening in celebration of the 80th anniversary of the heroic Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and other senior officials of the party and the state, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the KPA and Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, those related to the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and persons of merit.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, made a speech at the banquet.
					
					 The 80 year-long history of the KPA is the one of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, the invincible and iron-willed commander, and Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, the peerlessly Songun brilliant commander.
					
					 The 80 year-long history shining with victory and glory is being inherited as it is illustrated by the generals and supreme commanders down through generations, he said, stressing the need to more dynamically advance to the road of Songun and the road of socialism, keeping pace with the calls "Forward toward the Final Victory!" made to all service personnel and people made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the military parade for celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung, the Say of the Day.
					
					 A performance was given by the artistes of the Wangjaesan Art Troupe at the banquet.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Those who visited Pyongyang to participate in celebrations for the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung left here by air or train.
					 They included families and family members of Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr Zhang Weihua, Korean anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs in China Pak Kil Song and Kim Chol, China-resident Korean anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters So Sun Ok and Li Zade, Koreans related to anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China Kim Sun Ok, Ri Kwan Rin and Ryang Song Ryong and Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle Chai Shiying, Hu Zhenyi, Fan Delin, Chen Lei, Shang Yue, Zhang Shoujian, Wang Minggui, Ji Qing, Jiang Zihua, Feng Zhongyun, Liu Hanxing, Wang Xiaoming, Liu Tong-shi and Peng Xilu.
					
					 Overseas-residing Ri Hak Yu, family member of Son Won Thae who was related to the anti-Japanese struggle, and the family members of Ya. T. Nobichenko, an internationalist, also left here.
					
					 The delegation of the Fukuoka Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association led by Chairman Mamoru Kitahara went back home on Saturday.
					
					 On the same day a delegation of the Japan-DPRK Friendship Kyoto Net led by its Director Mitsihiro Sasaki arrived here.

articles.title: Delegations of Koreans in Japan Leave
articles.content:
Delegations of Koreans in Japan Leave
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The delegation of Korean residents in Japan for celebrating the 100th anniversary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung led by Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), left here on Saturday.
					 On the same day the delegation of officials of Chongryon led by Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, left here after visiting the socialist homeland.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea recently issued new commemorative stamps.
					 One of them shows letters reading "The title of DPRK Generalissimo was awarded to leader Kim Jong Il" while picturing the star of generalissimo and Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Printed in another stamp are letters reading "Institution of the Day of the Shining Star", "The Day of the Shining Star" and "February 16".  
					
					 Depicted in it are leader Kim Jong Il's old home in the secret camp of Mt. Paektu and fireworks displayed above Jong Il Peak.
					
					 They also include a stamp on the calls jointly published by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea to mark the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and a stamp in commemoration of the opening of the Korean Stamp Museum.

articles.title: Servicepersons, Civilians Vow to Wipe Out Rat-like Lee Group
articles.content:
Servicepersons, Civilians Vow to Wipe Out Rat-like Lee Group
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons and civilians in cities (districts) and counties of the DPRK met to vow to wipe out the group of rat-like Lee Myung Bak, the sworn enemy, in this land.
					 The statement issued by a spokesman for the KPA Supreme Command was read out to be followed by speeches.
					
					 Speakers condemned the group of rat-like traitors for hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK again, not content with committing the thrice-cursed high treason during the period of mourning the great loss to the nation. They vowed to wipe out them to the last man. 
					
					 They went on to say:
					
					 The rat-like Lee's thought is dominated only by the consciousness of escalating the confrontation with compatriots as he nurtured the shameless and crafty nature of wolf and fox.
					
					 The crimes committed by the disgusting rat-like group of traitors are lashing all the servicepersons and civilians into great fury and hardening their will to wipe them out.
					
					 All the workers, agricultural workers and youth will bring about a great surge in production and construction in the spirit of beating the rat-like Lee Myung Bak to death.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Invectives
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Invectives
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Provocation hysteria of thrice-cursed group of rat-like Lee Myung Bak has lashed the army and people of the DPRK into great fury.
					 The group egged Chon Yong U, senior presidential secretary for diplomacy and security of Chongwadae, on to let loose invectives against the DPRK. Chon called the system in the DPRK "hereditary" and talked about "limit" and "pressure to be faced by the north to make change" and went the lengths of saying that "if the north fails to find a way for a change, the world will change the north".
					
					 This is an unprecedented and blatant affront to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and another serious provocation that pushes the north-south relations to the lowest ebb.
					
					 Even the south Korean media and analysts became harshly critical of Chon's remarks, commenting they were prompted by "ignorance and misjudgment of the north" and "they were designed to bring about a turn in the phase for tiding over the crisis".
					
					 The puppet authorities also said that "Chongwadae may give the feelings of uneasiness to the people if it takes the lead in provoking the north".
					
					 A handful of rats, which go about ditches full of flies and mosquitoes, dared let loose rhetoric calling for breaking the sun, which can not be construed otherwise than a bullying act.
					
					 The earth goes around and living things exist as there is the sun. The group of rats, which is ignorant of how the world goes around, dared shake its fist at the sun.
					
					 Rats are born to gnaw at anything their mouths touch. Lee Myung Bak on the deathbed is still going on the rampage, speaking ill of the DPRK.
					
					 By setting in motion spiritless guys and letting them reel off a string of vituperation, the group seeks to save its face tarnished in the face of the toughest stand of the DPRK.
					
					 It is making last-ditch efforts to divert elsewhere the public criticism of Choe Si Jung and other close confidants of Lee troubled by scandals, and tide over the crisis.
					
					 The hysteric act of Lee reminds one of traitor Syngman Rhee who developed death symptoms before being expelled to the third country and becoming a forlorn wandering spirit. Syngman Rhee cried out for "northward advance" early in the 1960s, being unaware of how the world goes around.
					
					 The "yusin" dictator, who trumpeted about "unification by prevailing over communism" with malicious intent, also met a miserable end being shot by a bullet in the 1970s.
					
					 Now time has come for traitor Lee to meet more miserable end than Syngman Rhee and Park Chung Hee as he faces the strong protest of the nation.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group's hideous acts unafraid of the divine punishment have pushed the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an uncontrollable phase.
					
					 A war of thousand-fold retaliation has begun on this land.
					
					 Sharp bayonets held tightly by the army and people of the DPRK are ready to cut off the windpipe of the rats.
					
					 As the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK already declared internally and externally, they will mount merciless strike to show in practice a miserable end to be met by those who dared slander the dignity of the supreme leadership of the nation, those who have already been targeted by the arms of Songun.
					
					 Neither bluffing of the puppet army which is no more than cannon fodder, subservient to the U.S. nor the underground air-raid shelter in Chongwadae will help the group ward off the strikes.
					
					 The dirty den of rats will be blown up so that die-hard traitors like Lee and Chon will not be able to appear in the bright human world again.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Flays Japanese Big Wigs' Visit to Yasukuni Shrine
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Flays Japanese Big Wigs' Visit to Yasukuni Shrine
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The president and vice-president of the Liberal Democratic Party of Japan and others visited Yasukuni Shrine on April 23. On April 20, 81 members belonging to the Association of Dietmen for Visiting Yasukuni Shrine flocked to the shrine.
					The Japanese reactionaries paid a group visit to the shrine again despite unanimous protest of the international community at a time when the political situation in Japan was in utter confusion due to partisan strife. This cannot but arouse concern.
					
					Many countries around the world are making efforts to prevent the revival of militarism and fascism, recalling the past history of wars which brought disasters to them. It is, however, only Japan that behaves quite contrary to this trend.
					
					The Japanese reactionaries are regarding the shrine as a center for reviving fascism that had been used as a tool for infusing militarist ideology into people, militarist ruling mode and a lever for overseas aggression in the past.
					
					Through the visit to the shrine they praise the war criminals and imbue Japanese people with the idea of defending the history of aggression, not guilty consciousness, in a bid to create social atmosphere of militarism and reinvasion.
					
					It is their ulterior intention to hurl the people including the younger generation into overseas aggression when an appropriate time comes.
					
					It is quite natural for the international community to closely follow the moves of the Japanese reactionaries keen on overseas aggression to inject militarism into people, and heighten vigilance against Japan.
					
					As a matter of fact, there is mounting fever in Japan to visit the shrine and the number of official visitors to it is on the daily increase.
					
					This cannot but reflect the extreme militarist tendency prevailing throughout Japanese society, going beyond the scope of individual ultra-nationalists.
					
					Japan is prevalent with ultra-right social trend whereby dangerous aggression forces calling for overseas expansion and militarism are rampant, oblivious of the past.
					
					Japan's so-called Yasukuni culture means the revival of fascism.
					
					The harder the ultra-right conservative forces work to turn back the trend of history, agitating a war, the gloomier Japan's prospect will be.
					
					The road taken by Japan at present leads to the same destruction as what militarist Japan met in the past.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday runs a bylined article to mark the 33rd anniversary of the publication of the famous work of leader Kim Jong Il "On Thoroughly Establishing the System of Party Leadership".
					 This work is a historic document indicating the way for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche in any storm and important guidelines to be held fast by the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in building a thriving nation, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 A great idea and theory do not lose their vitality no matter how much water may flow under the bridge and how many generations are replaced. 
					
					 All the Party members are fully equipped with the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the monolithic Party leadership is being firmly established in the WPK, invincible steel-like party. This is the appearance of the WPK in the Songun era. 
					
					 Now is the time of gigantic struggle to carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The Party's decisions and instructions represent the organizational will of our Party and the Party's leadership is realized through the efforts that are made to implement the decisions and instructions. Successes in the revolution and construction would be inconceivable without the efforts to implement the Party policy. 
					
					 It would be possible to build a thriving socialist nation in this land when all the Party organizations, officials and members unconditionally accept and thoroughly implement the Party's decisions and instructions. 
					
					 The militant might of the Party is growing stronger as it has the revolutionary discipline and order under which all the Party organizations move as one under the monolithic leadership of the Party Central Committee, analyze and judge all the problems from the viewpoint of the interests of the revolution and from the stand of taking responsibility before the Party, state and people and handle them in line with the decisions of the Party Central Committee. 
					
					 The WPK will as ever display its might as an invincible party thanks to the revolutionary traits of remaining loyal to the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un that pervade the Party and the society.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Clean Sweep of Rat-like Group of Traitors
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Clean Sweep of Rat-like Group of Traitors
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- It is necessary to make a clean sweep of the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group of bastards bereft of elementary etiquette and morality. This is the only way of exalting the dignity and honor of the Korean nation and achieving reunification, the long-cherished desire of the nation, and prosperity at an early date.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a bylined article.
					
					 To eliminate the Lee group is the best way of protecting the dignity of the nation, a prerequisite for independent reunification, peace and prosperity and an indispensable requirement for carrying out progressive reforms in south Korean society, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The group of traitors totally negated the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, landmarks for reunification and prosperity in the new century, and rushed headlong into confrontation, war and tension, instead of working for inter-Korean reconciliation, unity and cooperation.
					
					 It went the lengths of escalating the confrontation with compatriots by hurting the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership. 
					
					 A series of hideous provocations committed by it up to this date  from late in 2011 prove that the group of traitors leave no means untried to realize its scenario to escalate the confrontation, utterly indifferent to the reunification and prosperity of the nation.
					
					 History teaches us that if the north-south joint declaration supported by all Koreans is to be implemented it is necessary to eliminate the Lee group of traitors, to begin with. The root cause of misfortune should be removed to save the nation from disaster.
					
					 The situation goes to prove that if the south Koreans are to realize their long-cherished desire, they should wipe out the rat-like Lee group to the last man.
					
					 It is the most urgent call of the times and the nation to eliminate the Lee group.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Defense Minister's Nonsensical Remarks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Defense Minister's Nonsensical Remarks
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean group of traitors staged a farce of opening to media new type missiles capable of "promptly striking" any part of the DPRK recently. This was followed by a MLRS firepower demonstration exercise in the forefront area in south Korean Kangwon Province.
					 Traitor Kim Kwan Jin, puppet minister of Defense, claimed this was aimed to "counter the north with new and more powerful weapons", talking about "actions to deter provocation" and "preserve peace".
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes these extremely provocative remarks can be made only by those determined to make showdown with the DPRK and not to rule out a war against it.
					
					 The reckless military provocations on the part of the south Korean puppet forces are a product of their dangerous scenario to push the situation to the brink of war, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is shameless, indeed, for Kim Kwan Jin to claim that its reckless saber-rattling was aimed to "deter provocations" and "preserve peace".
					
					 The above-said bluffing made by Kim while staging saber-rattling in the area close to the DPRK brought to light his true colors as a provoker and harasser of peace.
					
					 It is ridiculous, indeed, for him, nuclear war servant of outsiders, to dare hurt someone.
					
					 What he uttered is an open disclosure of its intention to lead the situation to a war.
					
					 It is an attribute of a tiger moth to jump into fire. It is bound to perish in the flames.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Pushing Situation to Brink of War
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Pushing Situation to Brink of War
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea issued a statement on April 25 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war.
					 It said:
					
					 Lee Myung Bak asserted that the north might spend a ridiculous amount of money for launching a long-range missile and that amount of fund would be enough to buy a large quantity of food. He also talked about "striking the supreme headquarters through an office window" and the "enforcement of agrarian reform", interfering in internal affairs of the north.
					
					 The provocations perpetrated by Lee, timed to coincide with the celebrations of the Day of the Sun in the north is a typical move of the Lee regime, forsaken by the people, to tide over the crisis by escalating the danger of a war.
					
					 The escalated tension between the south and the north created such situation that a war may break out any moment. 
					
					 The statement urged the Lee, disturber of peace on the peninsula, to step down at once. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the People for Achieving Peace Reunification of south Korea on Tuesday held the 122nd rally for peace and disarmament outside the "Ministry of Defense" to condemn the provocative and reckless actions of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors which sparked off a crisis. 
					
					 On the same day the Solidarity for Progress in south Korea released a commentary slamming the Lee group for pushing the situation on the peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 It accused Lee of taking the lead in making provocative remarks and perpetrating acts against the social system in the north and its supreme headquarters every day, straining the situation.

articles.title: S. Korean Religious Organization Condemns Authorities for Escalating Tensions
articles.content:
S. Korean Religious Organization Condemns Authorities for Escalating Tensions
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Council of Christian Churches condemned the "government" authorities for increasing the danger of war in the Korean Peninsula, according to CBS on Thursday.
					 It said that the south-north relations have been deteriorated and the situation has been pushed to the brink of war by the Lee Myung Bak regime. 
					
					 The council demanded Lee Myung Bak stop reckless remarks and acts escalating tension and conflict.

articles.title: Stop to Import of American Beef Infected with Mad Cow Disease Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Import of American Beef Infected with Mad Cow Disease Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Mad cow disease broke out in the U.S. again recently prompting people in south Korea to demand the "government" authorities stop at once the import of American beef, according to KBS and MBC of south Korea on April 26.
					 The opposition Democratic United Party and Unified Progressive Party accused the Lee Myung Bak "government" of not taking any step, while waiting for results of investigation in the U.S. as an onlooker to it.
					
					 The Korean Cow Society of south Korea said in a statement that there is again apprehension about mad cow disease, urging the authorities to take strong measures including a halt to the beef import.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Crimes Denounced by Koreans in U.S.
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Crimes Denounced by Koreans in U.S.
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. made public a statement titled "Traitor Lee Myung Bak will never be pardoned for defaming the celebrations of the Day of the Sun" on April 20. 
					 The statement said: 
					
					 The Lee group disallowed south Koreans to visit the north to mourn the untimely demise of Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission, in December last year and suppressed them, far from expressing condolences over it. Moreover, it kicked off extreme confrontation hysteria. Not content with this, this group dared to defame the celebrations of the Day of the Sun held with splendor by all Koreans and world progressives. 
					
					 Lee Myung Bak is an underwit ignorant of the north. 
					
					 He insisted that the working satellite of the DPRK is a missile and talked nonsense that the money spent for the celebrations of the Day of the Sun would be enough to buy food for the north Koreans to consume for several years. Does he have qualification to say so?
					
					 Since the appearance of the Lee Myung Bak regime, south Koreans have been hard to live. 
					
					 The fact that south Korea tops the list of suicide rate in the world clearly proves the incapability of Lee called 2MB. 
					
					 What a stupendous amount of money does Lee spend for the upkeep of the U.S. troops in south Korea and destruction of the land, utterly indifferent to the hard living of south Koreans? 
					
					 With the tenure of his office ending in less than one year Lee Myung Bak illegally expropriated state funds and whisked them away overseas. Witnessing this, south Koreans fear that what a ridiculous amount of funds will be whisked away by his family and relatives and his clan of politicians. 
					
					 Meanwhile, Kim Hyon Hwan, director of the Institute for Independent Idea in the U.S., released a statement denouncing the gravest provocation of the Lee group of traitors on the same day. 
					
					 Lee group malignantly defamed the celebrations of the Day of the Sun, far from paying tribute to the prominent great man produced by the nation, the statement said, branding this as the worst criminal act of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and the Korean nation.

articles.title: Chairpersons of Chongryon Headquarters Denounce Lee Myung Bak Group's High Treason
articles.content:
Chairpersons of Chongryon Headquarters Denounce Lee Myung Bak Group's High Treason
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Chairpersons of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) Headquarters released statements on April 23 in denunciation of the hideous provocations of the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group.
					 They included Hwang Myong, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, Pak Jong Song, chairman of the Hokkaido Headquarters, and Pu Yong Uk, O Jae Se, Ri Thae Hyong, Kim Hak Bok, Mun Kwang Hui, Ro Mu Hyon, Ri Yong Hun and Ri Ju Hak, chairpersons of the Osaka, Kanagawa, Hiroshima, Kyoto, Aichi, Hyogo, Ibaragi and Fukuoka prefectural headquarters of Chongryon.
					
					 They said all the officials of Chongryon and compatriots can hardly repress towering national indignation at the group of traitors who chilled the atmosphere of the celebrations of the centenary of the birth of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and severely hurt the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership.
					
					 They branded the group of traitors as heinous pro-U.S. fascist elements and traitors opposed to reunification hell-bent on confrontation with fellow countrymen and villains ignorant of ancestral elementary manners.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 There has never been such shameless and wicked bastard as traitor Lee Myung Bak in the history spanning 5 000 years. He is the sworn enemy with whom the nation cannot live under the same sky as he is going mad to break the single-minded unity of the DPRK.
					
					 The motherland is sure to emerge victorious thanks to the matchless strength of the servicepersons and people closely united around the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They vowed to protect the dignity of the supreme leadership of the nation to the last.

articles.title: Compatriots under Chongryon in Tokyo Denounce Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
articles.content:
Compatriots under Chongryon in Tokyo Denounce Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A meeting of compatriots under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) in Tokyo took place at the Korean Press Hall on Friday to wipe out the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors who hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the nation.
					 Present there were Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon and chairman of its National Rights Committee, Hwang Myong, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, and leading officials of organizations and enterprises of Chongryon, officials of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon and compatriots.
					
					 The statement issued by the DPRK government, political parties and organizations was read out, to begin with.
					
					 Speeches were made there by Song Kong Myong, vice-chairperson of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, Jo Myong Jin, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of the Korean Youth League in Japan, and Kim Sun Dok, chairperson of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan.
					
					 Speakers said that the high treason committed by the Lee group is a challenge to the ardent loyalty of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan who consider the dignity of the supreme leadership of the nation dearer than their own lives, holding the great men of Mt. Paektu in high esteem as the eternal sun and father of the nation.
					
					 They declared that all officials of Chongryon and compatriots under the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters fully determined to devotedly protect the dear respected Kim Jong Un would turn out as one in a nationwide struggle for wiping out the Lee group of traitors to the last man.
					
					 Prior to the meeting, the participants heard a statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and a video recording the Pyongyang city army-people rally vowing to wipe out the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group, the sworn enemy, in this land.

articles.title: Protest Letter to S. Korean Embassy in Tokyo
articles.content:
Protest Letter to S. Korean Embassy in Tokyo
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Youth League in Japan on April 20 sent a letter of protest to the south Korean embassy in Tokyo denouncing the south Korean group of traitors for disturbing the activities of Korean youth in Japan for national education. 
					 The letter said that the south Korean embassy urged the Korean community to be careful about the sinister moves of an anti-state organization before a lecture on mother tongue to be given by the youth league for young Koreans in Japan. 
					
					 This fully disclosed the traitorous nature of the Lee Myung Bak regime before the whole world, it said, and went on:
					
					 Since its formation the league has conducted national education for young Koreans in Japan who are subject to the Japanese authorities' discrimination. 
					
					 The organization protested against the south Korean authorities' unjust and undisguised interference, questioning, "Do the Korean youth in Japan not need any national identity and are they not allowed to have national consciousness?"

articles.title: South Korean Lee Myung Bak Group's Smear Campaign under Fire in Nigeria
articles.content:
South Korean Lee Myung Bak Group's Smear Campaign under Fire in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, issued a statement on April 22 condemning the south Korean Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for again hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 The Lee group again hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK recently, committing an unpardonable high treason before the times and history, he noted, and continued:
					
					 The 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK, was a great event common to mankind.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Lee Myung Bak group seriously defamed the holiday, far from congratulating the fellow countrymen on it.
					
					 Participating in the events held to significantly mark the holiday common to mankind, I witnessed the ardent yearning and boundless reverence of Koreans and world progressives for the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu. I can hardly repress my burning resentment at the Lee group which dared hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and defamed the inviolable sun of Juche for all of us.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and followers of the Juche idea brand the above-said indiscreet acts perpetrated by the Lee Myung Bak group as a blatant challenge to the DPRK and world progressives and vehemently condemn them.
					
					 We express invariable firm support and solidarity with the DPRK government and people in their efforts to uphold the socialist banner of Juche to the end.

articles.title: Foreign Magazines Mark Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth
articles.content:
Foreign Magazines Mark Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Chinese and Italian magazines carried special write-ups to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The April issue of "International Contact", magazine of Hong Kong, China, edited several articles with a photo of a smiling Kim Il Sung and photos of leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un inspecting units of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 An article titled "Korea, Inheritance of Socialist Cause" elaborated on how Kim Il Sung led the Korean revolution for decades and laid its eternal foundation and how Kim Jong Il devoted all his life to the completion of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 KPA Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un leads the Korean people's socialist cause, the magazine said, stressing that the Korean people will successfully accomplish the socialist cause generation after generation.
					
					 The April issue of Italian magazine La Voce carried a special write-up with a photo of a smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 In an article titled "Highest respect to the great leader President Kim Il Sung", the magazine said the President was revered by the Koreans and people of lots of countries century after century.
					
					 Diverse celebrations for the Day of the Sun that were held in various countries to glorify his undying feats on the 100th anniversary of his birth indicate that he is alive along with the human cause of independence, the article added.

articles.title: Celebrations Held Abroad
articles.content:
Celebrations Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Russia from April 6 to 18 to celebrate the birth anniversary of President           Kim Il Sung and congratulate the dear respected Kim Jong Un on his election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibitions were held in Cambodia, Peru, Angola and Ethiopia from April 11 to 27 to celebrate the Day of the Sun.
					
					 On view at the venues were immortal classic works of the peerlessly great men, photos of their undying feats and potted Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias, immortal flowers. Books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handicraft associated with the creative talents of the Korean people were also on display.
					
					 Congratulatory letters to Kim Jong Un were read out at events in Russia.
					
					 The first vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that the history of the DPRK would be unthinkable without feats of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The minister of Culture and Arts of Cambodia praised Generalissimo Kim Il Sung as a great hero who devoted all his life to the country and people.
					
					 The curator of Pyongyang Cultural Center in Peru said that there will not be such a great hero as Kim Il Sung who defeated two imperialisms in one generation.
					
					 The first secretary of the Partizansk City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that election of Kim Jong Un to the top posts of the party, state and army guaranteed the Koreans eternal prosperity and happiness and instilled fresh conviction and courage into the world revolutionary people.
					
					 The commander of the presidential guard unit of Angola said that the victory of building a thriving socialist nation is guaranteed in the DPRK as supreme leader Kim Jong Un leads its army and people.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Politician Congratulates Kim Jong Un on His Election to Top Post in DPRK
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Politician Congratulates Kim Jong Un on His Election to Top Post in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, issued a statement on April 21 to congratulate the dear respected Kim Jong Un on his election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The election of Kim Jong Un to the top posts of the party, state and army of the DPRK was a great auspicious event that guaranteed the bright future of Songun Korea and the eternal history of the nation, the statement said. It was the biggest fortune and greatest honor for the Korean people, it added.
					
					 It expressed conviction that only victory and glory will be in store for the army and people of the DPRK advancing under the leadership of the WPK headed by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Ukrainian Organization Supports Kim Jong Un's Work
articles.content:
Ukrainian Organization Supports Kim Jong Un's Work
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a statement on April 22 as regards the publication of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche".
					 Kim Jong Un in the work defined the Workers' Party of Korea as the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and formulated Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the party's guiding idea, the statement said.
					
					 This has provided the DPRK with an ideological and theoretical weapon for glorifying the revolutionary and patriotic legacies of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, it noted.
					
					 Concrete tasks and ways for improving the standard of people's living and stepping up the building of an economic power were also clarified in an all-round way in the work, it added.
					
					 The Association voices full sympathy with the work and would conduct positive activities to disseminate Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in the future, it stressed.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Is Genius of Ideology and Master of Leadership: Egyptian Personage
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Is Genius of Ideology and Master of Leadership: Egyptian Personage
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, praised the feats of President Kim Il Sung who founded the Juche idea and spurred the socialist cause.
					 He said this in a speech made at the forum of the World Congress on the Juche Idea held on the centenary of the birth of the President.
					
					 History records many great persons but the President tops the list, he said, adding:
					
					 The President was the genius of ideology and master of the leadership.
					
					 He built socialism centered on the popular masses under the banner of Juche, a society which demonstrates its might with independence in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliance in national defence.
					
					 He indicated the road of the struggle for building an independent and new society.
					
					 He set a shining example in building a socialist state in which the ideal of the popular masses is embodied.
					
					 He was the most outstanding leader with matchless courage and pluck.
					
					 No desperate efforts of the imperialists against the anti-DPRK campaign and moves to stifle it can ever topple the socialist system in the DPRK built by him.
					
					 The progressives of mankind are now looking up to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea with envious eyes and drawing strength and courage from the reality of Korea.

articles.title: Meeting for Solidarity with Koreans Held in Benin
articles.content:
Meeting for Solidarity with Koreans Held in Benin
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A meeting for solidarity with the Korean people took place in Cotonou, Benin on April 22.
					 The rector of Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin and other speakers said that the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea made no scruple of daring to insult the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu whom not only Koreans but the whole world revere and praise. This was an intolerable evil act against the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and the supreme dignity of the progressive mankind, they added.
					
					 They went on to say:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime systematically scuttled the north-south relations from the first days of its office and dared to slander the undisputed prestige of the great leaders upheld by the Koreans, pushing the inter-Korean relations to the lowest ebb.
					
					 It is the universal ethics of mankind to respect the supreme dignity of each country and nation irrespective of differing ideology, social system, religious belief and political view.
					
					 History will record a miserable end to be meted out to the group of confrontation-minded traitors who dared to point the finger at the sun, going against the progressives' noble sense of moral obligation.
					
					 The participants watched Korean film "Arms of Korea".

articles.title: India Successfully Launches Spy Satellite
articles.content:
India Successfully Launches Spy Satellite
 New Delhi, April 27 (KCNA) -- India Thursday successfully launched its home-made remote sensing spy Radar Imaging Satellite (RISAT-1) from the spaceport of Sriharikota in the southern state of Andhra Pradesh, sources said. 
					 The spy satellite would be used for disaster prediction and agriculture forestry as well as for defense purposes. It was launched using Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle PSLV. RISAT-1 weighs 1 858kg.

articles.title: U.S., Laughing Stock of World People
articles.content:
U.S., Laughing Stock of World People
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- In mid-April eleven U.S. Secret Service agents escorting the chief executive taking part in the 6th summit of the Organization of American States held in Cartagena, Colombia were reported to be involved in prostitution scandal, negligent of their duties, to experience a hot agony of shame.
					 Five U.S. soldiers belonging to them are now under investigation together with them for having gadded about here and there at night. Waitresses testified to the fact that all of them had been heavily drunk for a week.
					
					 In February an FBI agent left behind a file at a snack bar in France after taking food and drink. It dealt with the schedule of the U.S. chief executive in the country during the G-20 summit, a detailed sketch of the fifth floor of the hotel where he stayed and assignments for his personal safety. The owner of the bar was awarded a medal for reporting on it.
					
					 On April 19, a U.S. secret agency summoned a famous singer Newzent for interrogation. The singer in a speech concerning the U.S. presidential election to be held in November called for fighting in the November election till the present administration is strangled. This was the reason why the singer was taken for investigation.
					
					 The singer was also reported to have said in case the present chief executive is re-elected, he will be dead or imprisoned around the time a year later.
					
					 An American Brennan appeared naked at the airport in Portland of Oregon State in token of protest against the authorities' humiliating whole body X-ray examination before the airliner's take-off.
					
					 Photos of him were posted on U.S. internet homepages all of a sudden, sparking off public uproar.
					
					 All facts vividly show the true picture of the corrupt American society.

articles.title: Wretched Plight of Toiling Masses in Capitalist Countries
articles.content:
Wretched Plight of Toiling Masses in Capitalist Countries
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) --  The U.S. Department of Labor, quoting a recent survey, said that the number of the unemployed totaled 12.7 million in March across the country, 42.5 percent of them being long-term unemployed.
					 By the end of February, jobless people in Japan and Italy reached 2.89 and 2.3 million each. The rate of unemployment in Italy reached all time high since 2004.
					
					 Among the member countries of the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development grouping Western countries the number of the unemployed in February this year increased by half a million over that in the same month last year to reach about 45 million.
					
					 The skyrocketing commodity prices plus serious joblessness are throwing a large number of people into abject poverty.
					
					 In the last twelve months ending March this year the wholesale price in the U.S. jumped 2.8 percent. In the same period prices of foodstuff rose 4.6 percent in the UK while the prices of overall commodities leapfrogged 2.3 percent in France.
					
					 At a time when poverty is becoming a serious problem in the capitalist countries, the New York City authorities announced on April 17 that the rate of poverty in the city in 2010 increased 1.3 percent over the previous year.
					
					 49.1 million poverty-stricken people were registered in the country by the end of last year, 20 million of them suffering from abject poverty.
					
					 The number of poverty-stricken people reached more than 12 million in Germany and one of five persons are living below the poverty line in Greece. 
					
					 All facts go to prove that unemployment and poverty are an inevitable product of capitalist society and the miserable plight of majority of the population in the capitalist countries cannot be otherwise as long as the reactionary and unpopular social system exists.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente de Benin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente de Benin
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio el mensaje de felicitacion que le remitiera el presidente de la Republica de Benin Thomas Boni Yayi.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Me alegro mucho enviar a Vd. una sincera y calurosa felicitacion en nombre del pueblo y el gobierno de Benin y en el propio mio con motivo del 15 de abril de 2012, dia del centenario de natalicio de Su Excelencia Kim Il Sung, eterno presidente del pueblo coreano.
					
					En esta oportunidad especial, en que todo el pueblo coreano lo festejara unanimemente, le manifiesto la firme voluntad de trabajar con Vd. para fortalecer mas y activar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion que conectan ambos pueblos y Estados.
					
					Formulo votos por que se realice magnificamente el presente acto festivo y por la buena salud y felicidad de Vd. y por la paz y la prosperidad del amistoso pueblo coreano.
					
					Mas alta consideracion a Su Excelencia Primer Presidente.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitacion del presidente de Guinea Ecuatorial
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitacion del presidente de Guinea Ecuatorial
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 12 el presidente de la Republica de Guinea Ecuatorial, Obiang Nguema Mbasogo.
					El remitente senala en su misiva que el 15 de abril de 2012, dia del centenario del natalicio del Presidente   Kim Il Sung, es la fiesta importante y significativa que el pueblo de Guinea Ecuatorial debe celebrar junto con el hermano pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					Prosigue que la veneracion del pueblo de Guinea Ecuatorial al mas respetado Presidente Kim Il Sung sirve de piedra angular que impulsa la cooperacion entre nuestros dos paises que refleja siempre el ideal comun por la paz y el progreso.
					
					Agrega que ese dia significativo volvera a promover las maravillosas perspectivas de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises.
					
					Finalmente, el remitente expreso el testimonio de su mas alta consideracion al destinatario.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Joseph Kabila
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Joseph Kabila
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le dirigiera el dia 23 el presidente de la Republica Democratica de Congo, Joseph Kabila Kabange.
					El mensaje senala como sigue:
					
					Tengo el honor de enviar a Vd. las mas calurosas felicitaciones en nombre de todo el pueblo del Congo Democratico y el mio propio con motivo de su eleccion al maximo cargo del partido y el Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad feliz para ratificarle mi voluntad de desarrollar mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre nuestros dos paises y dos pueblos y desearle de todo corazon la felicidad y grandes exitos en su trabajo por la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					Su Excelencia Primer Presidente, reciba el testimonio de mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: ACNC comenta visita al santuario Yasukuni de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
ACNC comenta visita al santuario Yasukuni de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 23, el presidente, el vicepresidente y otros del Partido Democratico Liberal de Japon visitaron al santuario Yasukuni.
					Con anterioridad, el dia 20 los 81 parlamentarios adscritos a "Encuentro de parlamentarios para visitar juntos el santuario Yasukuni" adoraron en manadas en el santuario mencionado.
					
					Pese a la unanime repudio de la sociedad internacional, los reaccionarios japoneses volvieron a visitar en grupo al santuario cuando esta intranquila la situacion politica por las rinas faccionarias, lo cual provoca una severa preocupacion.
					
					Hoy en dia, numerosos paises y naciones del mundo, excepto a Japon, se esfuerzan por evitar el renacimiento del militarismo y fascismo recordando la historia de las pasadas guerras que acarrearon el desastre a la humanidad.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses maniobran para revitalizar el fascismo, utilizado en el pasado tiempo como medio de dominacion ideologica, la gobernacion y la agresion al extranjero del militarismo japones, y toman el santuario Yasukuni como su punto de apoyo.
					
					Mediante la visita al santuario, crean el ambiente social para la militarizacion y reagresion al preconizar los criminales de guerra e inculcar a los japoneses no el sentimiento apenado por la historia de agresion sino la ideologia que la defiende.
					
					El objetivo final de ellos es lanzar a la agresion al ultramar a los integrantes de la nueva generacion y otros habitantes cuando llegue el momento oportuno.
					
					Es natural que la sociedad internacional observe con alta vigilancia el alboroto de los reaccionarios japoneses que inflados con la ambicion de agresion al ultramar infunden el militarismo a los habitantes y eleve la precaucion sobre Japon.
					
					En realidad, en Japon sigue avivandose el fervor de adoracion en el santuario y se aumenta el numero de los visitantes, los cuales son el reflejo de la corriente ultramilitarista que se difunde en toda la sociedad japonesa por encima de ultranacionalistas individuales.
					
					Japon esta empapado de una tendencia social ultraderechista en que actuan a su antojo las peligrosas fuerzas agresoras aspirantes a la expansion al ultramar y el militarismo olvidando su pasado.
					
					La cultura de Yasukuni de Japon significa el resurgimiento del fascismo.
					
					Por mas que las fuerzas conservadoras ultraderechistas japoneses se desesperen para dar al reves la corriente de la historia incitando la guerra  tanto mas oscurecera su perspectiva.
					
					El camino andado por Japon esta colindado con el de autodestruccion experimentado por Japon militarista del tiempo pasado.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia nueva perorata de Kim Kwan Jin
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia nueva perorata de Kim Kwan Jin
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ACNC) -- Poco despues de que diera a la publicidad el misil de nuevo tipo capaz de "atacar inmediatamente" cualquier region de la RPDC, la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak organizo la demostracion del fuego de lanzacohetes reactivos en la zona avanzada del frente de la provincia de Kangwon en el Sur de Corea.
					Al respecto, el ministro titere de Defensa Nacional Kim Kwan Jin dijo que esa maniobra es para "disuadir la provocacion" de alguien y "mantener la paz", agregando que "se enfrentaria al Norte con la nueva arma mas poderosa".
					
					En un comentario individual difundido este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que ese discurso tan belicoso lo puede pronunciar solo el que esta dispuesto a enfrentarse hasta el final con la RPDC sin vacilar ni en la guerra, y continua:
					
					Las imprudentes provocaciones militares de los titeres surcoreanos parten de su aventurero intento de llevar la situacion al umbral de guerra.
					
					En contraste con sus mentiras de "disuadir la provocacion" y "mantener la paz", el traidor Kim demostro su sucia naturaleza de provocador y destructor de la paz al prometer el "ataque" contra la RPDC realizando el mencionado tiro de artilleria en la cara de esta.
					
					Su nueva chismografia significa la declaracion abierta de que llevaria la situacion actual a la fase de guerra.  
					
					Kim Kwan Jin morira quemado como el que se mete en el fuego con gasolina.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a exterminar la banda de ratones de Lee
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a exterminar la banda de ratones de Lee
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ACNC) -- Cuando exterminemos sin piedad a la banda ratonesca de Lee Myung Bak que no tiene la cortesia basica ni la moralidad del hombre, podremos salvar la dignidad y el honor de la nacion coreana y realizar con adelanto su anhelo sobre la reunificacion y prosperidad.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este sabado y continua:
					
					La liquidacion de la banda de traidores surcoreanos es el mejor remedio por defender la maxima dignidad de la nacion, la premisa de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad y la demanda indispensable por la reforma progresista de la sociedad surcoreana.
					
					Negando totalmente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, jalones de la reunificacion y prosperidad del nuevo siglo, esa camarilla vino marchando en contrasentido a la reconciliacion, la unidad y la cooperacion entre el Norte y el Sur, o sea, en busca de enfrentamientos, guerra y tension.
					
					Hoy dia, recrudece su campana de enfrentamiento fratricida insultando y difamando la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Los tremendos casos criminales, reportados desde finales del ano pasado hasta la fecha, comprueban que no les importa nada a los traidores surcoreanos la reunificacion ni la prosperidad de la nacion y ellos son capaces de cualquier cosa para satisfacer su ambicion de enfrentarse con sus connacionales.
					
					La historia muestra que se debe eliminar a la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak para implementar la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur apoyada unanimemente por toda la nacion.
					
					Hay que eliminar la fuente de desgracias para el bien de la nacion coreana, en particular, para realizar el deseo secular de la poblacion surcoreana.
					
					La epoca y la nacion demandan liquidar sin mas demora a la horda de ratones de Lee Myung Bak.
